mapper.insert: insert into product ( id, display_name, description, status_code, lot_type, start_date,end_date,country_of_origin, sales_chnl_attributes, product_line,product_type,sub_type,item_type, channel_code, factory_ship_vendor,sub_division_id,manufacturer, entity_id,class_id,brand_id,model_nb,legacy_id,short_name, has_price, service_type, ppk_id, cm_model_id, creation_date, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{displayName},#{description}, (select id from status_code where status_code = #{status}), (select id from lot_type where type = #{lotType}), #{startDate}, #{endDate},#{countryOfOrigin}, #{salesChannelAttributes, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.HstoreStringTypeHandler}::public.hstore, #{productLine},#{productType}, #{subType},#{itemType}, (select id from CHANNEL_CODE where CHANNEL = #{channel}), #{factoryShipVendor},#{subDivisionId},#{manufacturer}, #{entity},#{productClass}, #{brandId}, #{modelNumber},#{legacyId},#{shortName}, true, #{serviceType}, #{ppkId}, #{customizationModelId}, #{creationDate},current_timestamp )

insert into product_attributes (id, attribute_code, attribute_value) values
(#{id}, #{attr.code}, #{attr.values, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.ListToArrayTypeHandler})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id as id, p.short_name as shortName, p.display_name as displayName, p.description as description, p.status_code as status, lotType.type as lotType, p.start_date as startDate, p.end_date as endDate, p.country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, p.sales_chnl_attributes as salesChannelAttributes, p.product_line as productLine, p.product_type as productType, p.sub_type as subType, p.item_type as itemType, channel.channel as channel, p.factory_ship_vendor as factoryShipVendor, p.manufacturer as manufacturer, p.sub_division_id as subDivisionId, p.entity_id as entity, p.class_id as productClass, p.brand_id as brandId, p.model_nb as modelNumber, p.legacy_id as legacyId, p.has_price as priceAvailable, p.warranty_id as warrantyId, p.cm_model_id as customizationModelId, p.last_modified_date as lastModifiedDate, p.clearance_activation_date as clearanceActivationDate, p.clearance_deactivation_date as clearanceDeactivationDate, p.bulleted_description as bulletedDescription, p.truckable as truckable, p.is_preview_active as previewActive, p.is_production_active as productionActive, p.deactivation_reasons as deactivationReasons, p.length_start as lengthStart, p.length_end as lengthEnd, p.width_start as widthStart, p.width_end as widthEnd, p.is_deleted as deleted, p.is_sephora as sephora, p.is_hidden as hidden, p.disclaimer_ids as disclaimer_ids, p.creation_date as creationDate, p.service_type as serviceType, p.ppk_id as ppkId, p.service_description as serviceDescription, p.will_call_factory_ship as willCallFactoryShip,
ir.child_item_id as skuId,
abc.id as pp_id,
CASE WHEN pprv.id is null THEN abc.is_preview_active ELSE pprv.is_preview_active END as pp_preview_active,
abc.is_production_active as pp_prod_active,
subd.division_id as divId, subd.name as subDivName, subd.entity_id as subDivEntityId, div.name as divName,
b.name as brand_name, b.parent_brand_id as brand_parent_id, b.only_at_jcp as brand_only_jcp, b.is_deleted as is_brand_deleted
FROM product p JOIN lot_type lotType ON p.lot_type= lotType.id JOIN channel_code channel ON p.channel_code = channel.id join sub_division subd on subd.id = p.sub_division_id join division div on div.id = subd.division_id left outer join brand b on b.id = p.brand_id left outer join item_relation ir on ir.parent_item_id=p.id and ir.item_relation_type ='PRODUCT_SKU' left outer join item_relation ppl on ppl.child_item_id=p.id and ppl.item_relation_type ='PP_PRODUCT' left outer join product_presentation abc on abc.id = ppl.parent_item_id left outer join product_presentation_preview pprv on pprv.id = ppl.parent_item_id where p.id =#{id}

SELECT p.id as id, p.short_name as shortName, p.display_name as displayName, p.description as description, p.status_code as status, lotType.type as lotType, p.start_date as startDate, p.end_date as endDate, p.country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, p.sales_chnl_attributes as salesChannelAttributes, p.product_line as productLine, p.product_type as productType, p.sub_type as subType, p.item_type as itemType, channel.channel as channel, p.factory_ship_vendor as factoryShipVendor, p.manufacturer as manufacturer, p.sub_division_id as subDivisionId, p.entity_id as entity, p.class_id as productClass, p.brand_id as brandId, p.model_nb as modelNumber, p.legacy_id as legacyId, p.has_price as priceAvailable, p.warranty_id as warrantyId, p.cm_model_id as customizationModelId, p.last_modified_date as lastModifiedDate, p.clearance_activation_date as clearanceActivationDate, p.clearance_deactivation_date as clearanceDeactivationDate, p.bulleted_description as bulletedDescription, p.truckable as truckable, p.is_preview_active as previewActive, p.is_production_active as productionActive, p.deactivation_reasons as deactivationReasons, p.length_start as lengthStart, p.length_end as lengthEnd, p.width_start as widthStart, p.width_end as widthEnd, p.is_deleted as deleted, p.is_sephora as sephora, p.is_hidden as hidden, p.disclaimer_ids as disclaimer_ids, p.service_type as serviceType, p.ppk_id as ppkId, p.creation_date as creationDate, p.service_description as serviceDescription, p.will_call_factory_ship as willCallFactoryShip,
ir.child_item_id as skuId,
abc.id as pp_id,
CASE WHEN pprv.id is null THEN abc.is_preview_active ELSE pprv.is_preview_active END as pp_preview_active,
abc.is_production_active as pp_prod_active,
subd.division_id as divId, subd.name as subDivName, subd.entity_id as subDivEntityId, div.name as divName,
b.name as brand_name, b.parent_brand_id as brand_parent_id, b.only_at_jcp as brand_only_jcp, b.is_deleted as is_brand_deleted
FROM product p JOIN lot_type lotType ON p.lot_type= lotType.id JOIN channel_code channel ON p.channel_code = channel.id join sub_division subd on subd.id = p.sub_division_id join division div on div.id = subd.division_id left outer join brand b on b.id = p.brand_id left outer join item_relation ir on ir.parent_item_id=p.id and ir.item_relation_type ='PRODUCT_SKU' left outer join item_relation ppl on ppl.child_item_id=p.id and ppl.item_relation_type ='PP_PRODUCT' left outer join product_presentation abc on abc.id = ppl.parent_item_id left outer join product_presentation_preview pprv on pprv.id = ppl.parent_item_id where p.id in
#{item}
SELECT child_item_id FROM item_relation ir WHERE ir.parent_item_id = #{id} AND ir.item_relation_type='PRODUCT_SKU'
SELECT ir.parent_item_id FROM product lot join item_relation ir on ir.child_item_id = lot.id where lot.ppk_id = #{id}

select distinct fo.id, sku.preferred_view, attribute_code, attribute_value from (select id, attribute_code, UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(SA.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE,'[^a-zA-Z0-9]+','', 'g')) attribute_value
from sku_attributes sa where id in ( SELECT child_item_id from item_relation ir WHERE ir.parent_item_id = #{id} AND ir.item_relation_type='PRODUCT_SKU' )) fo join SKU sku on fo.id = sku.id
mapper.update:
UPDATE product SET display_name = #{displayName}, description = #{description}, status_code = (select id from status_code where status_code = #{status}), lot_type = (select id from lot_type where type = #{lotType}), start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, short_name = #{shortName}, country_of_origin = #{countryOfOrigin},
sales_chnl_attributes = #{salesChannelAttributes, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.HstoreStringTypeHandler}::public.hstore,
product_line = #{productLine}, product_type = #{productType}, sub_type = #{subType}, item_type = #{itemType},
channel_code = (select id from CHANNEL_CODE where CHANNEL = #{channel}),
factory_ship_vendor = #{factoryShipVendor}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, sub_division_id = #{subDivisionId}, entity_id = #{entity}, class_id = #{productClass}, brand_id = #{brandId}, model_nb = #{modelNumber}, ppk_id = #{ppkId}, legacy_id = #{legacyId}, service_type = #{serviceType}, cm_model_id = #{customizationModelId}, is_hidden = false, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false

UPDATE product SET bulleted_description = #{bulletedDescription}, truckable = #{truckable}, sub_type = #{subType}, item_type = #{itemType}, is_sephora = #{sephora}, disclaimer_ids = #{disclaimerIds, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.ListToArrayTypeHandler}, lot_type = (select id from lot_type where type = #{lotType}), sales_chnl_attributes = #{salesChannelAttributes, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.HstoreStringTypeHandler}::public.hstore, is_preview_active = #{previewActive}, is_production_active = #{productionActive}, deactivation_reasons = #{deactivationReasons, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.ListToArrayTypeHandler}, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE product SET is_preview_active = #{previewActive}, is_production_active = #{productionActive}, deactivation_reasons = #{deactivationReasons, typeHandler=com.jcpenney.digital.catalog.handler.ListToArrayTypeHandler}, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE product SET warranty_id = #{warrantyId}, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{productId} AND is_deleted = false
UPDATE product SET cm_model_id = #{customizationModelId}, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{productId} AND is_deleted = false

UPDATE product SET length_start = #{lengthStart}, length_end = #{lengthEnd}, width_start = #{widthStart}, width_end = #{widthEnd}, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{childProductId} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.delete: delete from item_relation where parent_item_id = #{id} and item_relation_type = 'PRODUCT_PRODUCT'
mapper.insert:
insert into item_relation (parent_item_id, child_item_id, item_relation_type, sequence_number) values
(#{id}, #{lot.childProductId}, 'PRODUCT_PRODUCT', #{lot.sequence})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET is_deleted = true WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.select: SELECT sub_type FROM product WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM product WHERE id=#{id})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM item_relation ir WHERE ir.parent_item_id = #{id} and ir.item_relation_type='PRODUCT_PRODUCT')

SELECT ir.child_item_id as childProductId, ir.sequence_number as sequence, p.length_start as lengthStart, p.length_end as lengthEnd, p.width_start as widthStart, p.width_end as widthEnd from item_relation ir join product p on p.id=ir.child_item_id where parent_item_id = #{id} and item_relation_type = 'PRODUCT_PRODUCT'

SELECT ir.child_item_id as lotId, p.legacy_id as legacyLotId, p.length_start as lengthStart, p.length_end as lengthEnd, p.width_start as widthStart, p.width_end as widthEnd, p.is_preview_active as lotIsPreviewActive, p.is_production_active as lotIsProductionActive, p.is_deleted as lotdeleted, ir.sequence_number as sequence, s.id as skuId, s.legacy_id as skuLegacyId, s.is_preview_active as skuIsPreviewActive, s.is_production_active as skuIsProductionActive, s.is_deleted as skudeleted from product p join item_relation ir on ir.child_item_id = p.id and ir.item_relation_type='PRODUCT_PRODUCT' join item_relation irs on irs.parent_item_id = p.id and irs.item_relation_type='PRODUCT_SKU' join sku s on s.id = irs.child_item_id where ir.parent_item_id = #{id}

SELECT p.legacy_id as childProductId, ir.sequence_number as sequence, p.length_start as lengthStart, p.length_end as lengthEnd, p.width_start as widthStart, p.width_end as widthEnd from item_relation ir join product p on p.id=ir.child_item_id where parent_item_id = #{id} and item_relation_type = 'PRODUCT_PRODUCT'
select id as id , legacy_id as legacyId, service_description as serviceDescription from product p where legacy_id = #{id} and is_deleted = false
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET service_description = #{serviceDescription}, last_modified_date = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.select: SELECT parent_item_id from item_relation where child_item_id = #{id} and item_relation_type = 'PRODUCT_PRODUCT'
SELECT parent_item_id from item_relation WHERE child_item_id =#{id} AND item_relation_type ='PP_PRODUCT'
SELECT id FROM product WHERE legacy_id = #{legacyId} AND is_deleted = false
SELECT legacy_id FROM product WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
SELECT cm_model_id FROM product WHERE id = #{id}

select id as id, attribute_code as code, attribute_value as values from product_attributes where id in
#{item}
select id as id, attribute_code as code, attribute_value as values from product_attributes where id = #{id}

SELECT color FROM jcp_catalog_core_schema.sku where id in ( select child_item_id from jcp_catalog_core_schema.item_relation where parent_item_id in (select id from jcp_catalog_core_schema.product where legacy_id = #{id}) )
